Request Accepts.description: Checks if the specified content types are acceptable, based on the request’s Accept HTTP header field.

Request Accepts Charsets.description: Returns the first accepted charset of the specified character sets, based on the request’s Accept-Charset HTTP header field.

Request Accepts Languages.description: Returns the first accepted language of the specified languages, based on the request’s Accept-Language HTTP header field.

Request Get.description: Returns the specified HTTP request header field (case-insensitive match).

Request Is.description: Returns the matching content type if the incoming request’s “Content-Type” HTTP header field matches the MIME type specified by the type parameter. Returns false otherwise.
